title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat history, RAG, and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs, model management, and streaming chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG prototype that combines Ollama with ChromaDB to chat over your documents.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Community-built terminal UI for Ollama using Rich; browse, search, and chat with models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean Next.js chat interface that talks to Ollama via the REST API; dark/light themes included.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React; no browser needed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama models through admin-configurable chat and embedding endpoints.
